scripts.test: node -e "if (process.env.RUN_TESTNET_INTEGRATION !== '1') { console.log('Skipping Testnet integration tests (set RUN_TESTNET_INTEGRATION=1 to run)'); process.exit(0); } const { spawnSync } = require('node:child_process'); const result = spawnSync('tsx', ['src/run.ts'], { stdio: 'inherit', shell: true }); process.exit(result.status ?? 1);"
